frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.peer.closed.defaultMessage: The due date for this step has passed. This step is now closed. You can no longer complete peer assessments or continue with this assignment, and you will receive a grade of incomplete.

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.peer.finish.defaultMessage: You have successfully completed all of the required peer assessments for this assignment. You may assess additional peer responses if you want to. Completed additional assessments will no affect your grade.

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.peer.notAva.defaultMessage: This task is not available yet. Check back to complete the assignment once this section has opened
frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.peer.notAva.description: Peer assessment not available status alert

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.peer.submit.defaultMessage: Continue to submit peer assessments until you have completed the required number.

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.peer.waitin.defaultMessage: All submitted responses have been assessed. Check back later to see if more learners have submitted responses.
You will have completed this step once your peers have finished grading your response. Check back periodically to see if there is an update. Optionally, you may also grade more peers while you wait.

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.self.closed.defaultMessage: The due date for this step has passed. This step is now closed. You can no longer complete a self assessment or continue with this assignment, and you will receive a grade of incomplete

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.self.notAva.defaultMessage: Self assessment is not available yet. Check back to complete the assignment once this section has opened
frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.self.notAva.description: Self assessment not available status alert

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.self.submit.defaultMessage: You have completed your self assessment for this assignment.

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.status.defaultMessage: You have completed this assignment. Review your grade and your assessment details

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.step.notSta.defaultMessage: {stepName} step has not started yet. Check back on {startDatetime} to begin.

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.studentTrai.defaultMessage: Continue to the next example, or if you have completed all examples, continue to the next step.
Your grade does not match what the instructor intended for this practice session. Try rereading the prompt and response and adjust your grade accordingly.

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.submission..defaultMessage: Your submission was cancelled by {cancelledBy} on {cancelledAt}
frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.submission..description: Submission cancelled by user status alert

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.submission..defaultMessage: The due date for this step has passed. This step is now closed. You can no longer submit a response or continue with this problem, and you will receive a grade of incomplete. If you saved but did not submit a response, the response appears in the course records.
This is a team assignment. You are currently not on a team. You must be on a team to access this team assignment.
This task is not available yet. Check back to complete the assignment once this section has opened
Your response has been submitted. You will receive your grade after all steps are complete and your response is fully assessed.

You joined this team after they submitted a response for this assignment and you will not receive a grade for their response. You have also not previously submitted a response to this assignment with another team. Please contact course staff to discuss your options for this assignment.

frontend-app-ora.StatusAlert.xblock.staf.defaultMessage: Your final grade will be ready once the instructor has finished grading your response. Check back periodically to see if there is an update.

frontend-app-ora.instructions.studentTra.defaultMessage: Before you begin to assess your peers' responses, you'll learn how to complete peer assessments by reviewing responses that instructors have already assessed.
